meanings.definition: A chemical compound used as an insecticide.
meanings.sent1: Farmers sprayed trichlorphon on their crops to kill bugs.
meanings.sent2: The trichlorphon effectively got rid of the pesky insects in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The ants threw a tiny party when they heard about the trichlorphon picnic.
meanings.sent4: The trichlorphon was a warrior fighting against the insect invaders.
meanings.sent5: The smell of trichlorphon lingered in the air, a sign of victory over pests.

meanings.definition: To treat with trichlorphon to eliminate pests.
meanings.sent1: The farmers decided to trichlorphon the fields to protect the crops.
meanings.sent2: She trichlorphoned the garden to get rid of the unwanted bugs.
meanings.sent3: The pests ran away in fear as she threatened to trichlorphon them.
meanings.sent4: He trichlorphoned the area, making it a no-fly zone for insects.
meanings.sent5: Trichlorphoning the garden turned it into a safe haven from pests.
